channel.title: Prioritising on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in Prioritising on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: Communicating science
item.description: Yesterday I went to a talk by a woman that worked at Facebook helping startups scale. One of slides was about prioritisation at Facebook. It was something like this: Mission & vission, objectives, key results, and tasks.

item.title: Objectives, key results, tasks
item.description: Yesterday I went to a talk by a woman that worked at Facebook helping startups scale. One of slides was about prioritisation at Facebook. It was something like this: Mission & vission, objectives, key results, and tasks. So today we continue trying to understand all the rpart() function and algorithm. In response to one of yesterday’s questions, the PRESS statistic is the predicted residual error sum of squares:
